page.title: 07Employment in Cranbrook
page.content: Unemployment in Cranbrook is not as big a problem as in other parts of the country.In Cranbrook most people find employment in jobs to do with retail services,farming,or tourism.(if not locally then in surrounding towns). Oasters employs many people,although the highest single employer is education.For skilled jobs,secretarial a managenial jobs Maidstone and Tunbridge wells offer the best oppertunities.For school leavers unemploment is not a problem.Apart from further education and the youth training scheme,the majority find full time employment.Cranbrook has a job centre and offices dealing with careers and youth employment,there is no immediate problem of unemployment increasing in this area.
